flawed_nl_solution:
The left-hand mice cost 120*0.3=$<<120*0.3=36.0>>36.0 more than right-handed ones
So they cost 120+36.0=$<<120+36.0=156.0>>156.0
So he makes 156.0*25=$<<156.0*25=9300.0>>9300.0 a day
The store is open 7-3=<<7-3=4>>4 days a week
So in a week, he makes 9300.0*4=$<<9300.0*4=37200.0>>37200.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3900.0, not 9300.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
